test_name: RBANS Update Form A Total Scale (TOT)
description: Composite indicator of overall neurocognitive functioning

test_name: RBANS Update Form A Attention Index (ATI)
RBANS Update Form A Digit Span

description: Efficiency of psychomotor speed, visual scanning ability, and visual-motor coordination

test_name: RBANS Update Form A Immediate Memory Index (IMI)
description: Composite verbal learning of a word list and a logical story

test_name: RBANS Update Form A List Learning
RBANS Update Form A Story Memory
RBANS Update Form A Language Index (LGI)
RBANS Update Form A Picture Naming
RBANS Update Form A Semantic Fluency
RBANS Update Form A Visuospatial/ Constructional Index (VCI)
description: Broadband index of visuospatial processing and construction

test_name: RBANS Update Form A Figure Copy
description: The accuracy of copying a figure from a model

test_name: RBANS Update Form A Line Orientation
RBANS Update Form A Delayed Memory Index (DRI)
description: Long-term recall of verbal and nonverbal material

test_name: RBANS Update Form A List Recall
description: Long-term recall of a word list

test_name: RBANS Update Form A List Recognition
description: Delayed recognition of a word list

test_name: RBANS Update Form A Story Recall
description: Long-term recall of a detailed story

test_name: RBANS Update Form A Figure Recall
description: Long-term recall and reconstruction of a complex abstract figure
